TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program Update 0.23 Launches Tuesday, December 17

Articles.Content:
Hey, everyone!

We are proud to announce that Kerbal Space Program update 0.23 will be launching this Tuesday, December 17.

For more details, read this PC Gamer article.

For even more details, keep your eye on KerbalKon, where we'll be revealing 0.23 in all its glory.
